update.sql: create table AssesmentRequestNotification ( id bigint not null auto_increment, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, sent datetime not null, primary key (id) )
create table NoPassedCoursesNotification ( id bigint not null auto_increment, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, sent datetime not null, primary key (id) )
create table StudyTimeNotification ( id bigint not null auto_increment, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, sent datetime not null, primary key (id) )
